Header: Woman among armed group arrested by Wattala Police
Content: Four individuals including a female, were arrested by police under suspicion, in the Wattala area. It is stated that they were arrested on suspicion of possible criminal activity.  Upon inspecting their vehicles – a van and a three wheeler – police discovered a revolver sans permit (handgun), ammunition and a live hand grenade. According to police, the suspects are residents of Peliyagoda and Pannipitiya.
